attributes.action: Introduce swipe card access/egress on every home in the country....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: everyone entering or leaving their home must swipe their ID card (yet to be introduced) before the door will open, thus enabling the Government to keep track of where they are - for their own safety.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
